verbose_text: Accordingly, we explored whether a low dose of the antioxidant sulforaphane (SFN) in combination with the epigenetic drug 5-aza-2 '-deoxycytidine (DAC) could slow melanoma cell growth.
evidence: sulforaphane (SFN) in combination with the epigenetic drug 5-aza-2'-deoxycytidine (DAC) could slow melanoma cell growth
